A Night in the Dark

<setup: dimly lit corridor, Svidrigaïlov with candle>  
<optional narration: A chilling encounter unfolds>  
Svidrigaïlov: “Where is that attendant?”  

<setup: dark corner, a little girl shivering>  
<optional narration: A lost child appears>  
Svidrigaïlov: “What are you doing here?”  
Girl: “Mammy will beat me!”  
Girl: “I bwoke a cup!”  

---
<setup: Svidrigaïlov kneeling, candlelight flickering>  
<optional narration: Concern deepens>  
Svidrigaïlov: “You’re safe now, don’t cry.”  
Girl: “I’m cold... so cold.”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Svidrigaïlov discovers a neglected, shivering little girl hiding in a dark corner of the hotel, revealing her fear of her mother and the harshness of her situation.
